title.rendered: The Next Generation Virtual Fair – May 2020

content.rendered:
This webinar will overview what we’ve learned from our partners about how to amplify the existing value of the career fair—especially revenue, student exploration, and recruiting—in a virtual format within Handshake.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Join a strategic team of product leaders at Handshake for a behind-the-scenes peek at our research and development on the next generation of virtual fairs in Handshake.
